text: The Mmabatho People's Party (MPP) was a political party in South West Africa, today's Namibia. It was formed in 1986 after a split in the Tshwana communal party, Seoposengwe Party. The MPP was led by Michael Simana. ==References== Category:Defunct political parties in Namibia Category:Political parties established in 1986 Category:1986 establishments in South West Africa
title: Mmabatho People's Party
